website_summaries.verdict: As a cycling shoe, the Merrell Roust Revel, manages to balance both comfort and performance for the wearer. The shoe is specialized with a bike-specific technology that provides pedalling efficiency. Rigidity, arch support, and flexibility are provided by the molded and contoured lasting board of the shoe. The thin comfort tongue and the slightly padded collar give off an additional comfort and breathable feeling for the foot.
pros: The Merrell Roust Revel, according to a majority of the reviewers, is an extremely comfortable shoe
Most reviewers said that the shoe is very light
Some reviewers are highly-appreciative of the shoe’s design
A reviewer said that the Merrell Roust Revel is by far the best-looking vegan sneakers he has seen
The mesh lining of the shoe gives off a breathable feeling for the foot
The M-Select FRESH anti-microbial agents of the shoe reduce the odor and provide a hygienic feel
The M-Select GRIP feature of the shoe provides ground stability
Multiple colorways of the shoe are available to choose from
cons: A few reviewers complained about the sole of the shoe wearing out easily
A reviewer claimed that the shoe is too narrow
A buyer said that the shoe is too stiff for biking
One reviewer said that the shoe is not really a good choice during wet weathers

customer_reviews.title: Good bike shoes, fair walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these "bike" shoes on a bicycle yet but I think that they would be good for that purpose. I wear them while doing office work and also around the home doing house-work. They are comfortable at first, but after 3-4 hours the soles of my feet can use more support than these shoes provide.
customer_reviews.author: J M Streble

customer_reviews.title: Merrell are the most comfortable shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: Merrell are the most comfortable shoes on the market. 4 stars instead of five because I don't like the style of most models.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. Very light, fabric upper is sturdy and has a liner on inside. My only issue is that the sole is very firm so you may need to buy an insert
customer_reviews.author: Momanny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely comfortable and stylish. Wish the Merrill logo was more prominent. You'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: g.brown

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes, great for walking around
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, great for walking around, and I love the color. The only bad thing that I can find is that the support seems to be fading on the outside heel. If I think about it when I walk, it feels like I am about to roll my ankle when my heels hit the ground. But it's not enough to bother me, it's just something small and insignificant I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super light and cushy
customer_reviews.text: Super light and cushy. The upper as an internal structure (meaning its not just fabric). Very comfortable shoes. I'm in them all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Van Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Merrell has always treated me well. This shoe is just too narrow for me.

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are pretty bad when it's event remotely wet outside
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars, however, these shoes are pretty bad when it's event remotely wet outside. The soles are basically a sponge and soak up everything until your foot is soaked. Otherwise, great shoe, very comfortable.
